# Eclipse specific files
.classpath
.project
.settings/

# Java build output
bin/
build/
target/
out/


# IntelliJ (in case someone opens it there too)
*.iml
.idea/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Package Files #
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# Test reports
/test-output/

# Coverage reports
coverage/
jacoco.exec

# Temporary files
*.class
*.swp
*.swo
